author: marioevz
content: Yes definitely, it’s been a request by basically all teams and there’s no mention in the spec or EIP that they should be accepted before the fork so we’ll remove it from the test

author: robocopsgonemad
content: here's another one:  `ForkchoiceUpdatedV3 Set Head to Shanghai Payload, Nil Payload Attributes (Cancun)` is expecting a non-error response when it tries to call `engine_forkchoiceUpdatedV4`, which.... isn't a thing.
